About.paragraph: I'm Sneha Baskaran , dedicated and passionate person. Having thirst to learn new technologies to stay updated to the current IT Industry . Currently , I'm Working in Relevantz Technology Services as Junior Software Engineer in Chennai .
Why2: Technical skills - Mastery in c# , React and MySql.
Why3: Passion - Dancing and Learning new things.

Testimonials.text: Developed a Learning Experience platform (LXP) that delivers personalized learning experience for the end users.
Testimonials.name: Learning Experience Platform 2024

Testimonials.text: Developed a Mobile store management system during my training period where the user can login in to the website they can see the mobiles , categorize based on the model , Brand name and price. User can be able to add the mobile to the cart if they want to buy the added mobile they can buy or they can able to purchase later.

Features.title: Education
Features.text: Completed my under graduate in B.Tech Information Technology with 8.43 CGPA in C.Abdul Hakeem college of Engineering and Technology.

Features.title: Technical Skills
Features.text: Mastery in c#, React, MySql, and  30+ technologies.

Features.title: Work Experience
Features.text: I'm a trained full stack developer and I have a 1+ years of experience in Relevantz Technology Services.

Features.title: Achievements
Features.text: I'm happy to share that I have been promoted from Trainee-Software Engineer to Junior Software Engineer. Over the past year , I have had the privilege of undergoing comprehensive training and had a hands on experience working with real-world projects.
